item.description:
Imagine.... the holidays are over, 2009 has begun and now is the time to put your New Years Resolution, to run more, into practice!

Charley and Sonya are running the Boston Marathon in April 2009 to raise money for individuals with disabilities (www.dlc-ma-org) and we need your help to motivate and support us in this challenge.

Please join us on a special New Years Resolution Breakfast run around a 5 mile Charles River loop... we'll run with silly hats and noisy horns to celebrate the first run of the year to all passersby.

Afterwards there'll be a special brunch with champagne at Dave's house and a raffle for some awesome prizes.

Remember, it's for charity so any cash or check donations would be greatly appreciated - people have been giving anywhere from $15 to $75 so far, however, anything will be greatly appreciated!

Happy Holidays and looking forward to celebrating with you into the New Year!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the New Year's Hats and Headbands

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Cheeky Charley and Sporty Sonya's New Year's Resolution Run!
